crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'job' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'status': doc.pvt_job_status, 'created': doc.pvt_created, 'job_type': job_type }); }

list_by_type.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'job' || doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.job_type) return; emit([doc.job_type, doc.pvt_created], {'id': doc._id, 'status': doc.pvt_job_status, 'created': doc.pvt_created}); }
